paper_abstract: A generalized Boltzmann transform is introduced to convert the Richards' equation into an ordinary differential equation, and an approximate solution for the moving wetted front of water transport in unsaturated soils is obtained. The developed theory is also valid for water transport in porous fabrics. (C) 2013 Published by Elsevier Ltd.
paper_title: On Richards' equation for water transport in unsaturated soils and porous fabrics
